attributes.action: Stop the cuts at Taunton fire station
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the devastating cuts to Taunton fire station which will if successful see a reduction in 50% of whole-time fire cover.

We have 11 weeks to show the fire authority that these cuts cannot go ahead.

It is paramount for public and firefighter safety that the two fire engines are primary crewed and have sufficient staff on duty to crew the special appliances that are based at Taunton station.
